movies:
Guillermo del Toro ရဲ့ Frankenstein ကတော့ တကယ်ကိုစောင့်ရကျိုးနပ်တဲ့ ရုပ်ရှင်ပါပဲ။ Monster တွေ Creature တွေနဲ့ ပတ်သက်လာရင် စိတ်ချရတဲ့ Guillermo del Toro ကတော့ Frankenstein ကိုလည်း အလှပဆုံးနဲ့ အခမ်းအနားဆုံးဖြစ်အောင် ဖန်တီးသွားနိုင်ပါတယ်။
Frankenstein ရုပ်ရှင်ပေါင်းများစွာကြည့်ခဲ့ဖူးပြီဆိုပေမယ့် Guillermo del Toro ရဲ့ လက်ရာနဲ့မှ ပြည့်စုံသွားတယ်လို့ ခံစားရပါတယ်။
Oscar Isaac, Jacob Elordi, Mia Goth, Christoph Waltz

Bob Ferguson (Leonardo DiCaprio) is a former revolutionary who has been hiding for 16 years. When his past catches up to him in the form of Colonel Steven J. Lockjaw, Bob must team up with old allies to save his kidnapped daughter.
Leonardo DiCaprio, Sean Penn, Benicio del Toro, Regina Hall
Based on the viral indie game, a young man finds himself trapped in a looping subway station. He must find the anomalies to escape 'Exit 8' or be trapped forever.
Told entirely from the perspective of a loyal dog named Indy, who must protect his sick owner from a malevolent spirit haunting their new home.
On the Italian Riviera, an unlikely but strong friendship grows between a human being and a sea monster disguised as a human.
Jacob Tremblay, Jack Dylan Grazer, Emma Berman
Five assassins aboard a fast-moving bullet train find out their missions have something in common.
Brad Pitt, Joey King, Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Brian Tyree Henry
After being fired, a desperate man creates a fake paper company to eliminate his competitors one by one in this dark satire.
At a top secret research facility in the 1960s, a lonely janitor forms a unique relationship with an amphibious creature that is being held in captivity.
Sally Hawkins, Michael Shannon, Octavia Spencer, Doug Jones
The story of American scientist J. Robert Oppenheimer and his role in the development of the atomic bomb.
Cillian Murphy, Emily Blunt, Matt Damon, Robert Downey Jr., Florence Pugh
A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.
Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Elliot Page, Tom Hardy
A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.
Matthew McConaughey, Anne Hathaway, Jessica Chastain

Armed with only one word, Tenet, and fighting for the survival of the entire world, a Protagonist journeys through a twilight world of international espionage on a mission that will unfold in something beyond real time.
John David Washington, Robert Pattinson, Elizabeth Debicki
A Formula One driver comes out of retirement to mentor and team with a younger driver.
Brad Pitt, Damson Idris, Javier Bardem
Two elite operatives stationed on opposite sides of a mysterious gorge must work together when they discover what is truly hidden below.
Miles Teller, Anya Taylor-Joy, Sigourney Weaver
The sequel to the 2019 blockbuster animation. Ne Zha returns with his dragon friend Ao Bing to face new destinies.
tv: A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine in order to secure his family's future.
Bryan Cranston, Aaron Paul, Anna Gunn
Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for millennia.
Emilia Clarke, Kit Harington, Peter Dinklage
When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces in order to get him back.
Millie Bobby Brown, Finn Wolfhard, Winona Ryder
Follows the lives of 5 families living on the same street in a neighborhood called Ssangmundong in Seoul.
Lee Hye Ri, Park Bo Gum, Ryu Jun Yeol
A 21st-century woman travels back in time to the Goryeo Dynasty and gets involved in a struggle for the throne.
A hive-mind virus connects humanity, but one woman remains immune.
cast: Cillian Murphy is an Irish actor. He began his professional career as a rock musician. He rose to fame in 28 Days Later (2002) and is best known for his collaboration with Christopher Nolan, playing the Scarecrow in The Dark Knight Trilogy and the lead in Oppenheimer (2023), for which he won an Academy Award.

Brad Pitt is an American actor and film producer. He has received multiple awards, including two Academy Awards and two British Academy Film Awards. He is known for roles in Fight Club, Ocean's Eleven, and Once Upon a Time in Hollywood.

Leonardo Wilhelm DiCaprio is an American actor and film producer. Known for his work in biopics and period films, he has received numerous accolades, including an Academy Award, a British Academy Film Award, and three Golden Globe Awards.

Guillermo del Toro Gómez is a Mexican filmmaker, author, actor, and former special effects makeup artist. He is best known for his Academy Award-winning fantasy films Pan's Labyrinth and The Shape of Water.

Christopher Edward Nolan CBE is a British-American filmmaker. Known for his complex storytelling, he is considered a leading filmmaker of the 21st century. His films include Inception, Interstellar, and The Dark Knight Trilogy.

Anya-Josephine Marie Taylor-Joy is an actress. She won the Trophée Chopard at the 2017 Cannes Film Festival and has received various accolades, including a Golden Globe Award. She is known for The Queen's Gambit and The Menu.

Oscar Isaac is a Guatemalan-born American actor. He has been credited with contributing to a change in the portrayal of Latinos in Hollywood. He starred in Inside Llewyn Davis, Ex Machina, and the Star Wars sequel trilogy.

Robert Downey Jr. is an American actor and producer. His career has been characterized by critical and popular success in his youth, followed by a period of substance abuse and legal troubles, before a resurgence of commercial success in middle age as Iron Man.
config: Frankenstein, F1, Ne Zha 2, One Battle After Another, Pluribus
